name: Puppy Moon
description:
Special offer 50% OFF!

** Notice: In this version, coin doubler is enabled! Every coin you collect counts two. Isn't is awesome? Yes, it is!
** This game is very POPULAR in Korea heading to No.1 in the paid game chart. If this game takes the top place in the chart, a huge updated will be made!

** Contents update by the feedback from users!
1st content update: Legendary Dog
2nd content update: Gadget shop
3rd content update: Slot Machine
Thank you for all those feedback!



- Game Description -

Dogs in space! Dogs in space!

An adorable dog is jumping on the moon looking for its missing master.
Jump further and further!

Collect coins, bones and complete the missions to unlock more dogs.

Feature
- 50 dogs
- 30 missions
- 5 Powerful items
- Global ranking
- Slot machine
- 1 legendary dog
